publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5364 Tommy Sheridan: Acceptance of Scottish Banknotes—That the Parliament notes with concern that London Underground ticket kiosk machines do not accept Scottish banknotes; notes that ticket machines can be reprogrammed to accept Scottish banknotes as the Parliament has done with its own cashless vending service, and calls on London Underground to reprogramme its ticketing machines to accept Scottish banknotes.

S2M-5364 Tommy Sheridan: Acceptance of Scottish Banknotes—That the Parliament notes with concern that London Underground ticket kiosk machines do not accept Scottish banknotes; notes that ticket machines can be reprogrammed to accept Scottish banknotes as the Parliament has done with its own cashless vending service, and calls on London Underground to reprogramme its ticketing machines to accept Scottish banknotes.
S2M-5364 Acceptance of Scottish Banknotes (lodged on 20 December 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-5364 Tommy Sheridan: Acceptance of Scottish Banknotes—That the Parliament notes with concern that London Underground ticket kiosk machines do not accept Scottish banknotes; notes that ticket machines can be reprogrammed to accept Scottish banknotes as the Parliament has done with its own cashless vending service, and calls on London Underground to reprogramme its ticketing machines to accept Scottish banknotes. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
